extendedInfo.description: Are you an undecided?Do you never know what decision to make?Do you need someone to make a totally random decision?This App is for you!It will follow you every day and it will help you make random decisions, allowing, in addition, to always keep at hand the most frequent choices for you.Suggestions are always welcome.

reviews.title: Great but a few things missing
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for an app like this and it satisfies quite well. However it would be nice to have the option to save lists of choices. I also noticed that after a quite a few choices are inserted you\'re unable to see the new ones in the list (it still seems to add them to the generator though)
reviews.author: Daniel Colome

reviews.title: Not random
reviews.comment: Only picks first or fourth choice.
reviews.author: Ellisa Barnes
